Posts.Content: Hi Honey, Your Mom knew how much you loved her. Please do not ever feel guilty about her care, you did all you could and you were a good daughter. Your mom is always with you. She wouldn't want you to sit around feeling sad, she would want you to be happy sweetheart. I know it is hard. She is with Jesus now and feelingno more sickness or pain.   I am praying for you, Your friend, Kellyann
Posts.Title: my died from breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thanky you both so much! I am going to print out this message so I can refer back to  it. Can't type much today as I am in pain, but I wanted t thank you and let you know what a Blessing you are to me!   Kellyann
Posts.Title: IBC: Found out I have it...need advise please!

Posts.Content: Hi Everyone! I have just found out I have Inflammatory breast cancer. I am really scared because I have read that it is the worst of all breast cancers to get because it is so aggressive. I am to get a port put in my chest 3-24 so I can begin chemo. I see my cancer specialist on 3-23. So far I have only had the mammograms,sonograms, and biopsy done. the biopsy came back malignant and the doctor told me I have IBC. I knew it anyway from my symtoms, but it sure hit me like a ton of bricks anyway when the doctor told me and it made it "REAL" if you can imagine. Anyway, I am very worried how I'm going to do on chemo. I have chronic lyme disease already and have FMS also, I know, lucky me, haha! I would really welcome any advise you can offer me! Your friend, Kellyann
Posts.Title: IBC: Found out I have it...need advise please!
